title: Trade Deadline, Iverson Classic Announcement, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Trade Deadline, Iverson Classic Announcement, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Matt and Stak breakdown the CRAZY trade deadline and buyout market action from this past week. Plus, they reveal the rosters for this years Iverson Classic which they will be coaching in and answer fan questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
